items.title: A gift for Xmas 2021
items.summary: This is a musical gift for Christmas 2021
items.content_text: Today I want to share with my readers the Ludovico Einaudi Concert playlist.Have a moment to yourself, take an hour to listen to this music, and enjoy.  Listen on YouTube  Listen on SpotifyHappy Xmas 2021!
items.content_html:
Today I want to share with my readers the Ludovico Einaudi Concert playlist.

Have a moment to yourself, take an hour to listen to this music, and enjoy.

  • Listen on YouTube
  • Listen on Spotify

Happy Xmas 2021!
